Generate the map data.
Decompress and draw the map tiles to the surface.
Regenerate the map data.
Update the old dynatile data with new dynatile data. Only update the differences between the two.
Compress the map's tile data, then return the map manager itself.
Decompress the map's tile data, then return the map manager itself.
Compress the map's dynatile data, then return the map manager itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int tile_x, int tile_y, Tile|int tile)
memberdef.name: draw_tile

para.verbatim: Draw a specific tile to the screen at specified x and y tile positions, then return the map manager itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int tile_x, int tile_y, Tile|int tile)
memberdef.name: set_tile

para.verbatim: Set the tile at specified x and y tile positions and of specified tile type, then return the map manager itself.
Return the tile at specified x and y tile positions.
Set the map's tile data, then return the map manager itself.
Return the map's tile data.
Set the map's compressed tile data, then return the map manager itself. The provided compressed tile data must be of same origin as that generated from the map manager's tile data compression method.
Return the map's compressed tile data.
Set the map's dynamic tile data, then return the map manager itself.
Get the map's dynamic tile data.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int tile_x, int tile_y, bool tile_state)
memberdef.name: set_dynatile

para.verbatim: Set the dynamic tile at specified x and y tile positions and of specified used state (bool), then return the map manager itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int tile_x, int tile_y, bytes ext_bytes_obj=b'')
memberdef.name: get_dynatile

para.verbatim: Return the dynamic tile state at specified x and y tile positions. Extract from an external compatible bytes object if one is given.

Set the map's compressed dynatile data, then return the map manager itself. The provided compressed dynatile data must be of same origin as that generated from the map manager's dynatile data compression method.
Return the map's compressed dynatile data.
Randomise the map seed, then return the map manager itself.

Return the map seed.

Return the x position of the map.
Set the y position of the map, then return the map manager itself.
Return the y position of the map.
Set the width and height of the map in tiles, then return the map manager itself.
Return the width of the map in tiles.
Return the width of the map in pixels.
Return the height of the map in tiles.
Return the height of the map in pixels.

Return the map's dynamic surface.
